mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.like_count, p.mission_id, p.written_datetime, c.companion_type AS together, p.emotion_id, p.user_id, p.companion_id, m.mission_content AS mission_content, DATE_FORMAT(m.mission_date, '%m월 %d일') AS mission_date, mt.theme_name AS main_thema_name, st.theme_name AS sub_thema_name, e.emotion_name AS emotion_name, c.companion_type AS companion_type FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( title, content, like_count, mission_id, written_datetime, together, emotion_id, user_id, companion_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{missionId}, NOW(), #{together}, #{emotionId}, #{userId}, #{companionId} )
